## Fertility Data Explore

```{r include=FALSE}
library(dslabs)
library(tidyverse)
gapminder
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
gap2011 <- gapminder %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  filter(year == 2011)
```

```{r}
gap2011 %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=fertility, y=gdp/population, size=population, color=continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  xlab("Fertility Rate") +
  ylab("Per Capita GDP")
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = gap2011, mapping = aes(x=fertility)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(x=fertility))
```
